sn14.1:1.3: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
sn14.1:1.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn14.1:2.2: Cakkhudhatu rupadhatu cakkhuvinnanadhatu, sotadhatu saddadhatu sotavinnanadhatu, ghanadhatu gandhadhatu ghanavinnanadhatu, jivhadhatu rasadhatu jivhavinnanadhatu, kayadhatu photthabbadhatu kayavinnanadhatu, manodhatu dhammadhatu manovinnanadhatu—
